ovdesc.p: A work file holding a record for each customer whose static details or account details have changed since the last outgoing tape was produced. This file is updated by the applications ACCOUNT, CUSTOMER and ACCOUNT.BGC.INFO.

desc.p: Identifies the old country of residence of the customer.
2 type SSS(uppercase alpha) Country code characters. Externally updated only.
Contains posting restriction from the corresponding old account record.
1 or 2 numeric character Posting Restriction code. Associated with field range ACCOUNT.NUMBER to BLOCK.CODE. Externally updated only.
This field is the old TOWN and COUNTRY field from the customer record.
Up to 35 type s (uppercase alpha or numeric characters) Externally updated only.
Contains an update date specify what changes have happened to the account.
This code is in the range 1 to 4:
1 indicates this is a new account. 2 indicates modifications to an existing account. 3 indicates an account closure. 4 indicates the reopening of an old account.
Multivalued field up to 1 numeric characters. Associated with field range ACCOUNT.NUMBER to BLOCK.CODE. Externally updated only.
Id of the customer whose static details have changed.
10 numeric characters.
Must be valid ID on the customer file.
Contains the second part of the TOWN COUNTRY field from the customer record.
Up to 35 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric) characters. Externally updated only.
Contains account numbers of the customer whose static details have changed.
Multivalued field up to 16 numeric characters. Associated with field range UPDATE.CODE to BLOCK.CODE. Externally updated only.
This field contains the old street from the customer record.
Up to 35 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric) characters. Externally updated only.
Contains CPARTY REQUIRED flag from the corresponding old ACCOUNT BGC INFO record.
Up to 2 numeric characters. Associated with field range ACCOUNT.NUMBER to WENST.ADRESSEN. Externally updated only.
2-digit block code as defined on BGC.BLOCK.CODE file.
Contains the branch number from the corresponding account record.
Multivalued field up to 5 numeric characters. Associated with field range ACCOUNT.NUMBER to BLOCK.CODE. Externally updated only.
This field is the old SHORT.NAME from the customer file.
Up to 35 type SS (uppercase alpha or numeric, first character alpha) characters. Externally updated only.
Contains CPARTY REQUIRED flag from the corresponding old ACCOUNT BGC INFO record.
YES or NO. Associated with field range ACCOUNT.NUMBER to BLOCK.CODE. Externally updated only.
